caption:
Fontainebleau School (French, 1530s–ca. 1710), Verso: after Francesco Primaticcio (Italian, 1504–1570), Birth of Adonis, 16th century. Recto: Pen and brown ink, and brown wash

; 37 x 50.3 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1948-1847)
